SEARCH
Package com.bteam.common.models

Class GridPlacementService

java.lang.Object
com.bteam.common.models.GridPlacementService
public class GridPlacementService extends Object
Service class for the initial placement

The class is responsible for the placement of the given Characters into the GridService.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static void
    placeCharacters(GridService gridService, List<CharacterEntity> characters, int[] startTilesRows)
    Places characters in the allowed starting rows at the bottom of the grid.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Method Details

    • placeCharacters

      public static void placeCharacters(GridService gridService, List<CharacterEntity> characters, int[] startTilesRows) throws DestinationInvalidException, DestinationAlreadyOccupiedException, NotAStartPositionException, FullStartTilesException
      Places characters in the allowed starting rows at the bottom of the grid.
      Parameters:
      gridService - GridService that manages the grid
      characters - list of CharacterEntity objects to place in the grid
      startTilesRows - array with the exact row numbers allowed for placement
      Throws:
      DestinationInvalidException - if a specified position is out of bounds
      DestinationAlreadyOccupiedException - if a specified position is already occupied
      NotAStartPositionException - if the destination Tile is not a valid starting position
      FullStartTilesException - if there are more characters than available start tiles
